lines.text: Yip yip! Yip yip! Yip... yip! (Hi, hi! Have I got the offer for you! Your ceramic piece for... trash!)
Yip yiiiiiip~ (You know you want this traaash~)
Yip YIP yip YIP... Yip YIP yip YIP... (Guess I'll keep ALL this LOVELY trash to myself... If only SOMEONE had CERAMIC...)
Yip! Yip yip yip yip! Yip yip yip yip! (Yup! This offer's still available! Trade now to win!)
Yip. (Well, my trash pile awaits when you collect more ceramic pieces.)
